title: Guided Meditation & Energy Healing (Private)
cleaned_text: You are capable of creating more ease, health, vitality and abundance in your life by utilizing your own energy! Explore a deeper connection body/mind/soul with this guided meditation & energy healing session. After a brief intake to customize your experience you will be guided through a relaxation with breathwork and meditation to assist your personality in aligning with open, invite and allow to deeper flow of ease and support with your own soul and energy body. During this time you will be also receiving energy work to support the unfolding of your intentions for the session.
